content: तत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [तन्-क्त] {@--1@} Extended, spread; <ls>Śi. 9. 23</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">6. 50</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Spreading or reaching over, extending to. {@--3@} Covered over, concealed. {@--4@} Protracted, continued. {@--5@} Bent (as a bow). {@--6@} Spreading wide &c.; see तन्. --तः <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} A father. {@--2@} Wind, air. {@--3@} Extent. {@--4@} Offspring, a child ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also). {@--5@} A son. --तं Any stringed musical instrument.
